name: Word Ring
description:
Join the Ring with the latest innovation in word games on iPhone & iPad.

2 GAME MODES

• Classic
Create words quickly as you progress through levels of increasing difficulty.
Rings of letters and blocks will fall more and more rapidly.

• Rush
Find as many words as possible in 2 minutes. For every word you find
you'll gain more time.


WORLDWIDE LEADERBOARD

Test your skills against the world !
Each dictionnary has more then 80 000 words. It's up to you to chain a
maximum number of words or take your time to find complex ones.


SCORING SYSTEM

Find words between 3 and 10 letters.
Avoid repetitions to score more points
Use tactics and memorize the ring to compose longer words


Feature :
• 2 innovative game modes
• 3D graphics never seen in a word game
• Gamecenter with tons of achievements
• Leaderboard
• English, french, german, spanish, italian,dutch and portuguese dictionnaries
